p: M. chamomilla is a one-year-old aroma plant from the chicory family. It grows in farms and gardens in central and southern Iran (Vahidi, 1986 ▶). Shiraz M.chamomilla contains various substances such as kamazolen, flavonoids that cause anti-inflammatory, antispasmodic, antimicrobial, antifungal, palliative and wound healing effects and accelerate wound healing (Arazi, 2003 ▶)(Khalessi et al.,2004 ▶).
